channel.title: Emote Timer?

item.title: Emote Timer?
item.dc:creator: @Nookumdip Nookumdip
item.description:
@Nookumdip wrote:

Hi

I added this:
case 2357:
if (c.memberStatus == 1){
c.sendMessage(“You search the bush…”);
c.sendMessage(“And find a maul!”);
c.startAnimation(881);
c.getItems().addItem(15039, 1);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You search the bush…”);
c.sendMessage(“And find nothing… :(”);
c.startAnimation(881);
}
break;

How do I add a timer so after 1 second of the animation “881” I want a new emote.
help ?

Read full topic
